And now we have launched 6E Hotels to make your journey with us more pleasant and memorable. Finding the perfect accommodation is crucial as it can elevate your travel experience from ordinary to extraordinary. No matter if you're planning a luxurious getaway on the islands, or a budget-friendly adventure to the mountains, book hotels that are just right for you to have a comfortable and memorable stay. But why choose IndiGo for 6E Hotels? Not only does it provide flights to every part of the country, but it also offers a plethora of hotel options to make your travel planning more convenient. You can save big on your travel as IndiGo offers exclusive hotel deals when you book directly using the IndiGo app and web. Our IndiGo members booking flights and hotels can save up to 30% on over 5 lakh hotels. You can effortlessly book your desired accommodation across the world. When embarking on your hotel booking journey, consider these key factors to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience: Location: While booking hotels online, check the location. It can significantly impact your overall travel experience. Whether you prefer to be in the heart of the city, near popular attractions, or surrounded by nature. Amenities: From luxurious spas and infinity pools to complimentary breakfast and high-speed internet access, search hotels based on these amenities for a fulfilling vacation. Make a list of must-have amenities and prioritise your preferences when selecting your accommodation. Budget: You can get a series of options; find cheap hotels online and set a realistic budget for your accommodation-related expenses. Keep in mind that flexibility with travel dates and booking in advance can often lead to significant savings. Reviews: Make sure to take time to read reviews before booking hotels to gain insights into the quality of service, cleanliness, and overall experience. Pay attention to both positive and negative feedback to make a decision. Flexibility: While hotel booking online, choose an accommodation that does not levy additional charges if you wish to change the dates. Why choose hotel booking with IndiGo? Booking hotels online using IndiGo offers several advantages for travellers. If you book a hotel online using IndiGo 6E Hotels, you can save up to 30% on your booking. But remember, this is applicable only if you have made an account on the IndiGo website and are a member. Apart from this, IndiGo IndiGo's online hotel booking option provides a seamless and convenient booking experience, allowing users to search for a wide range of accommodation options. By booking hotels through IndiGo, travellers can also enjoy the convenience of managing their entire trip’s itinerary in one place, from flights to accommodation, enhancing overall travel efficiency. How to book a hotel online with IndiGo? Booking hotels online with IndiGo is easy. But to simplify even more, here is a step-by-step guide to hotel booking online. Visit the official website of IndiGo at www.goindigo.in Look for the "6E Hotels " tab on the main menu bar. It's located alongside options like " Flights ," " Web Check-In ," "Manage Booking," etc. Click to proceed. Search hotels by adding your destination in the box, check-in and check-out dates, number of rooms, and the number of guests. Fill in this information accurately. Once you've entered your details, the website will display a list of available hotels that match your criteria. You can sort and filter these results based on factors like price, location, star rating, and guest reviews. You can choose the hotel that best suits your needs and preferences. You will then be redirected to another page. You can then scroll through the hotel details, choose a room to your liking and click on “Reserve Now.” Under “Review your Booking” you'll be prompted to enter your personal details and payment information to confirm the booking. Follow the prompts and make sure to double-check all the information before proceeding. Once the booking is confirmed, you'll receive a confirmation email containing all the details of your reservation. Make sure to keep this email handy for reference. Depending on the hotel and IndiGo's offerings, you may have the option to add extras like airport transfers, meals, or sightseeing tours to your booking. If you need to make any changes to your reservation or have any inquiries, you can manage your booking through the IndiGo website or contact the customer service team. Hotels near me To find the best 6E Hotels near your location using IndiGo hotels, start by visiting IndiGo's website or downloading their mobile app. Once there, you can search your hotel based on your destination or current location. You can refine your search by specifying criteria such as price range, star rating, amenities, and distance from your location. With the IndiGo 6E hotels option, you can book hotels in Mumbai, hotels in Delhi, hotels in Goa, hotels in Bengaluru, hotels in Chennai, hotels in Chandigarh and many more. This helps to tailor the results to your preferences. Read reviews and check ratings of the hotel: Pay attention to review and rating of the hotels from previous guests. Keep in mind that while some negative reviews are inevitable, consistently positive reviews are a good indicator of a hotel's reliability. Check for hotel location and accessibility: While booking hotels consider the proximity of the hotel to your intended destinations. Look for hotels with convenient access to public transportation or major highways if you plan to explore the area. Compare the hotel prices: Compare prices from the list of hotels provided in the IndiGo website to ensure you're getting the best deal. Keep an eye out for promotions, discounts, and special offers that IndiGo provides for your selected dates. Consider alternative accommodations: In addition to traditional hotels, consider alternative accommodations such as bed and breakfasts, guesthouses, or vacation rentals. These options often provide unique experiences and may offer better value for your money. Check for flexible hotel booking options: Given the uncertainty of travel plans, especially in today's climate, prioritise hotels that offer flexible booking policies and cancellation options. You can seamlessly book hotels in Mumbai, hotels in Delhi, hotels in Goa, hotels in Bengaluru, hotels in Chennai and many more. How to look for cheap hotels on IndiGo? These fuel-efficient and technologically advanced aircraft offer passengers a comfortable and enjoyable flying experience. Convenient booking options: IndiGo offers multiple booking channels, including their official website, mobile app, and third-party travel agencies. This flexibility allows passengers to book flights easily and conveniently, using their preferred method. Advantages of booking flights with IndiGo? Offering cheap flights to a slew of domestic and international destinations, IndiGo aims at connecting different destinations by offering over 1500 flights every day. At IndiGo, we prioritise the comfort of our customers above everything else. In accordance with the same, we at IndiGo offer multiple additional benefits on direct booking along with hassle-free and courteous airport and in-flight services. Listed below are some of the benefits of booking air tickets with IndiGo: IndiGo offers the lowest flight booking fees, EMI options, and many other booking perks. With IndiGo, you can cancel your flight tickets at zero convenience fee. Passengers can choose from different types of fare such as Lite Fare, Flexi Plus Fare and others for additional savings. Get additional discounts when you book with categories such as Unaccompanied Minor, Armed Forces, Students, LTC, Doctors & Nurses. Offers multiple payment options to choose from, such as UPI, NetBanking, etc. Opt for Seat Select and choose a preferable window seat or extra legroom at the time of booking. IndiGo provides a Delayed & Lost Baggage Protection add-on at the time of booking, which assures compensation in the event your check-in bags are delayed, lost, or damaged due to any unforeseen circumstance. In addition, IndiGo also offers an array of add-ons such as 6E Prime, Fast Forward, Lounge Services etc. With our AI-powered chat assistant, 6Eskai you can sort all of your booking queries. You can also get booking-related notifications and answers to your queries on WhatsApp. What are the popular Indian cities which are frequently visited by people? There are so many stunning cities IndiGo flies to across India each catering unique beauty, culture, landscape and languages. Among these, several cities stand out as popular destinations with luxury to mid-range 6E Hotels for both domestic and international travellers, such as: New Delhi: The capital city of India, New Delhi is known for its historic landmarks such as the Red Fort, Qutub Minar, India Gate, and Humayun's Tomb. You can book flights to Delhi which also serves as a gateway to the Taj Mahal in Agra. Mumbai: As the financial capital of India and home to Bollywood, Mumbai is a bustling metropolis. This stunning Maharashtran city is known for its vibrant nightlife, iconic landmarks like the Gateway of India and Marine Drive. Jaipur: While it is known as the "Pink City" due to its distinct pink-coloured buildings, Jaipur is famous for its majestic forts and palaces. After booking flights to Jaipur, you can include these attractions in your itinerary like Hawa Mahal, Amer Fort, and City Palace. Goa: The coastal city renowned for its beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and Portuguese colonial architecture, Goa is a top destination for both domestic and international tourists who are seeking for some Sun, sand, and relaxation. Varanasi: Considered one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world, Varanasi is a popular pilgrimage site. This city is known for its ghats along the River Ganges, where religious rituals and ceremonies take place. Kolkata: The former capital city of India, Kolkata offers rich history, cultural heritage, and intellectual legacy. A city of contrasts, blending colonial-era architecture with bustling markets, vibrant festivals, and a thriving arts scene. Chennai: The capital of Tamil Nadu, Chennai is known for its beautiful beaches, classical music and dance, historic temples, and colonial-era architecture, making it a popular destination for culture and heritage enthusiasts. Hotels FAQs Q: How do I book a hotel online in India? A: To book a hotel online in India, visit https://www.goindigo.in/hotels . Search for hotels based on your preferences, select a room, enter your details, review, and confirm your booking. To find deals, sign up, check special offers sections, and use coupon codes that are available at the time of booking. Q: How do I book a hotel online in India? A: To learn about amenities, please visit 6E Hotels website, find the property listing, and check the description for features and services. Explore the room details section to find specific amenities provided in the room you are considering. Q: What mode of payment can I use to book a hotel? A: We offer a variety of payment options to ensure convenience and flexibility for our users while booking their preferred accommodations. Credit Cards Debit Cards Net Banking Mobile Wallets UPI (Unified Payments Interface) Q: How do I confirm my hotel booking and what should I do if I don't receive a booking confirmation? A: Upon successful completion of your booking, you will receive an email confirmation with all the essential details of your reservation. Please check your email inbox, including the spam or junk folder, to locate and review your booking confirmation. Q: If “My Booking” could not be confirmed, and the amount was debited from my account. What should I do? A: At times it can happen that the payment was successful but unfortunately, the suppliers could not confirm the hotel booking for reasons like inventory being sold out. In this case, once we verify and understand the booking could not be confirmed, we shall refund your money and the same will reflect in your account within 5-7 working days. Q: Do I have to show ID proof at the time of check-in? A: Yes, you can use applicable government issued photo-ids accepted by the hotel for example: Aadhar Card, Voter ID, Driving License, Passport & other as per hotel policy. Q: Is ID proof required for every guest in the room? A: All guests staying in the room (above the age of 18) are required to provide identification at check-in. (For international bookings PAN card number of the traveller may be asked at the time of booking) Q: How to cancel the hotel booking and what are the cancellation charges? A: To cancel your hotel booking, visit the website, login and go to the “My Booking” section. You will be able to cancel your booking from here. Q: Do I need to pay anything extra after cancelling my booking? A: When cancelling, you would be eligible for a refund as per the policy. Any applicable cancellation charges will be deducted from your initial payment, with the remainder refunded.
